creator: GameClub Inc.
descriptionHtml:
An avalanche of adventure awaits you in this chilly game of pinball. A giant multiscreen course set on a treacherous snow-covered slope welcomes you as you launch your snowball from target to target. Go beyond real pinball with special springs, platforms, and obstacles that threaten to bury you in a pile of powder. Smooth and simple controls allow you to use a variety of bumpers, flippers, and other objects to keep your snowball rolling!

If all else fails, don't be afraid to give things a little nudge. Hit the snowmen and try to juggle multiple snowballs at once. Take advantage of the raw scoring power to drive your scores to whole new levels. Head to the mountain in the daytime or try the night course for a different perspective on the mountain. Search high and low for hidden secrets and grab gems wherever you find them in order to accumulate as many points as possible. Snowball is the coolest pinball game around!

Challenge the Mountain: This massive course is full of tricks, targets, and obstacles you'll have to navigate with precise shots!

Hunt for Secrets: Hit the right targets and aim for the right places and you'll find extra points in the unlikeliest of places!

Intuitive Controls: Tap either side of the screen to activate the various flippers, springs, and platforms that keep your snowball moving. Activate the Tesla coils to really get things rolling!

Day or Night: Head to the slopes during the daytime or get a different view on things with the night mode!

Activate Multiball: Hit the snowmen to spawn extra snowballs and do your best to keep them all in play to earn tons of extra points!

Gems Galore: The course is covered with gems of different shapes. Collect them to earn even more points!

Glorious Pixels: Don't get too distracted by the detailed pixel art. There's a lot happening on this mountain, so keep your eyes peeled for some fun surprises!
**************************************************

Snowball!! - GameClub is playable for free, with some sections and features available only to subscribers of GameClub Pro, an optional auto-renewing monthly subscription which also removes ads. Besides the GameClub Pro subscription, there are no other in-app purchases in this game.
If you choose to purchase the optional subscription:

- Payment will be charged to your Google Play account at confirmation of purchase. No charge will be made for the free trial period.
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior of the current period, at the cost indicated.
- You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal by going to your Google Play account settings after purchase.
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable
- Terms of use: https://gameclub.io/terms
- Privacy Policy: https://gameclub.io/privacy
descriptionShort: Hit the slopes in a pinball adventure that will give you the cold sweats!

Thanks for playing this GameClub game! GameClub offers a curated catalog of iconic games, with new titles released every week. Subscribers get access to unlimited gameplay, no ads, and no additional purchases — just pure fun.

This update contains bug fixes and performance improvements. Let’s play!

Glorious Pixels: Don't get too distracted by the detailed pixel art. There's a lot happening on this mountain, so keep your eyes peeled for some fun surprises!
**************************************************

GameClub is a subscription mobile gaming service. If you like our games, try our auto-renewing monthly subscription for 30 days free, and play all of our games with no limits, no ads, no hidden fees, and no other in-app purchases.

If you choose to purchase GameClub’s optional subscription, payment will be charged to your Google Play account at confirmation of purchase. No charge will be made for the free trial period. Your subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior of the current period, at the cost indicated. You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal by going to your Google Play account settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Terms of Use: https://gameclub.io/terms
Privacy Policy: https://gameclub.io/privacy

_________

If you have any questions, please contact us at support@gameclub.io

Facebook: facebook.com/gameclub
Twitter: twitter.com/gameclub

Thank you!
